title: Late Delivery
complaint_description: Order did not arrive by the promised delivery date (2025-11-08). Customer still waiting.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Check carrier tracking, provide updated ETA, and offer 10% refund or coupon for future purchase. If lost, reorder item with expedited shipping.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #6922. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
